A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
this movie sucks.

The purpose of these films\, the force awakens and the last jedi now were to kill off your childhood heroes. and in that regard i guess they were a success. carrie fisher looked as though she had alzheimers and had wandered onto the set and read a few lines. sad.

and poor luke ugh. disgusted\, i am.

a real shame as rogue one was a pretty good movie so i was hoping they would come through and redeem themselves with this one\, but nope. pure garbage.
